sample_spot_diameter.description: Set the Diameter of the sample spot size in cm

sample_time.description: Time in seconds between two samples.

filter_scattering_factor.description: Scattering of Filter. 1.39 for magee ae33, 1.66 for pallflex t60a20 in aethlabs maeth51

airflow_per_minute.description: Adjust airflow per minute in liter

af_sensor_type.description: Type of Airflow Sensor. Set to 0 for P0001A1 and 1 for P0010A2

reverse_dutycycle.description: Reverse pump duticycle; off for most generic without controller!

pump_dutycycle.description: Power 0-255 for the pump. Set automatically if airflow sensor.

pwm_freq.description: Pulse width modulation frequency for pump duty cycle.

swap_channels.description: Swap data channels if you see continous negative values or on Rev 2 bcMeters.

compair_upload.description: Upload Data to CompAIR. Needs coordinates.

get_location.description: Get rough location by IP automatically each time?

location.description: Location of the bcMeter. Keep syntax exactly like that [lat,lon]

use_display.description: bcMeter is provided with a display

is_ebcMeter.description: Use the device for direct emission measurement

send_log_by_mail.description: Periodically receive log files by mail.

mail_logs_to.description: Enter e-mail adress(es) to send the log files to, comma separated

filter_status_mail.description: Rececive a mail when filter change is suggested

disable_pump_control.description: ON to disable internal pump control

mail_sending_interval.description: Send logs every X hours (between 6 and 24)

email_service_password.description: this is the password if you want to receive emails. contact jd@bcmeter.org if you want to use the service
